name: @rainstormy/updraft
description: Updraft updates changelogs and bumps version numbers when you are about to release a new version of your project.
author: Steffen Diswal

dependencies.fast-glob: A runtime library that enables glob patterns in the file system.
dependencies.tslib: A runtime library that optimises TypeScript applications when the `importHelpers` option is enabled in `tsconfig.json`.

devDependencies.@vitest/coverage-v8: A Vitest plugin that reports code coverage.
devDependencies.@vitest/ui: A Vitest plugin that provides a test overview in the web browser.
devDependencies.downdoc: A tool that converts AsciiDoc documents to Markdown to improve compatibility with npm.
devDependencies.simple-git-hooks: A tool that creates Git hooks from Yarn script commands.
devDependencies.typescript: A statically typed programming language that extends the JavaScript syntax.
